Name: GEODETIC DATUM
Explanation: THE GEODETIC DATUM TRANSFORMATION WILL IDENTIFY THE PARAMETERS REQUIRED TO TRANSFORM COORDINATES REFERENCED TO THE LOCAL GEODETIC DATUM INTO COORDINATES REFERENCED TO THE WORLD GEODETIC SYSTEM 1984 DATUM AND VICE VERSA. THIS WILL ALLOW FOR THE DESCRIPTION OF A UNIQUE AND UNAMBIGUOUS LOCATION.

Name: COORDINATES DATUM
Explanation: DATUM USED IN THE PRODUCTION OF THE BASE REFERENCE MAP, GRAPHIC OR THE COORDINATE ITSELF.

Name: MAP DATUM
Explanation: THE POINT (DATUM) FROM WHICH THE GEOGRAPHIC REFERENCING OF A MAP SERIES ORIGINATES. [REF: STANAG 2439, AINTP-3]
